statements: DELETE FROM required_minimum_distributions WHERE account_holder_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM required_minimum_distributions WHERE id = 1 AND age > 70 AND distribution_amount <= 1000.00;
DELETE FROM required_minimum_distributions WHERE account_holder_name LIKE 'John%' AND retirement_account_type = 'IRA';
DELETE FROM distribution_calculations WHERE required_min_distribution > 500 AND calculation_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM distribution_events WHERE account_id = 100 AND event_date <= '2022-05-20';
DELETE FROM retirement_account WHERE account_id = 101 AND account_owner = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM distribution_events WHERE account_id = (SELECT account_id FROM retirement_account WHERE account_age > 60) AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM required_min_distributions WHERE age > 60 AND distribution_amount > 500.00;
